slug.aiHint: Lowercase, hyphens only — derived from the property title

specs.aiHint: Extract bedroom count, bathroom count, total area with units, and parking spaces

data.title: The Skyline Penthouse
data.subtitle: Where the city meets the sky

gallery.alt: Penthouse living room with panoramic city views

data.description: Perched atop one of the city's most coveted towers, The Skyline Penthouse offers an unparalleled living experience. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame panoramic views of the urban landscape, while Calacatta marble floors and bespoke millwork define every meticulously crafted space. The open-plan living and dining area flows seamlessly into a chef's kitchen, creating an ideal canvas for both intimate evenings and grand entertaining.

data.title: Serenity Villa
data.subtitle: A private paradise reimagined
data.description: Nestled within lush tropical landscaping, Serenity Villa is an architectural masterpiece that harmonises indoor and outdoor living. The residence features soaring double-height ceilings, walls of glass that dissolve into manicured gardens, and an infinity-edge pool that stretches toward the horizon. Every material — from the natural stone facades to the engineered hardwood interiors — has been selected for its beauty and longevity.

data.title: Azure Residence
data.subtitle: Coastal luxury, elevated
data.description: Azure Residence captures the essence of coastal sophistication. With unobstructed ocean panoramas from every room, this residence offers a lifestyle defined by light, space, and tranquillity. The open-plan design features polished concrete floors, natural timber accents, and a seamless flow to a wraparound terrace — the perfect stage for watching the sun sink below the horizon.

data.headline: Only Three Residences. Infinite Luxury.
data.subtext: A private oceanfront tower housing just three bespoke residences — each a masterwork of space, light, and uncompromising design.
